sentences.en: Based on above researches, we produced this new crotch - structure microfluidic chip.
sentences.cn: 并且通过对多种分叉结构的流场仿真, 得出了最优的分叉形式.

sentences.en: Figure 1 : Continuous flow lines in highly stressed crotch area.
sentences.cn: 图 1: 高应力弯钩区域的连续流径线.

sentences.en: Glover kicked him hard in the crotch.
sentences.cn: 格洛弗狠狠地踢他的胯部。

sentences.en: He climbed into the crotch of a tree.
He has a dull heavy ache in the crotch.
How can you let him talk to your crotch like that?
sentences.cn: 你怎么可以让他对你的胯部这样说话?

sentences.en: I know that I love you baby crotch fan - fan sure where this impulse aflutter!
sentences.cn: 我知道我爱的那个宝贝肯定在你裤裆樊帆里冲动呢!

sentences.en: I see a Renaissance at his crotch under your splayed legs.
sentences.cn: 我看到你岔开的腿下他的腿裆鼓起文艺复兴时代的包.

sentences.en: Saddle width is too narrow and low in crotch.
The child was sitting on a crotch of a tree.
sentences.cn: 那孩子坐在树的枝桠上.

sentences.en: The low crotch of the vest revealed a stiff shirt bosom of white and pink stripes.
sentences.cn: 西装背心的低领里露出浆得笔挺的白底粉红条纹衬衫的前胸.

sentences.en: There's a hole in the crotch.
These jeans are too tight in the crotch.
sentences.cn: 这牛仔裤的裤裆太紧了.

sentences.en: They were too long in the crotch.
When you look this good, who can blame you for licking your own crotch?
sentences.cn: 当你看见这么美丽的我舔你的裤裆时你会责怪 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: （人体的）胯部，两腿分叉处，裤裆
trans.tran_en: the part of your body between the tops of your legs, or the part of a piece of clothing that covers this
